Articles.Content: playing with experience enabled, i got all SAS locks with a level 0 pilot, i already tested the windows version via proton and on another computer, same results

That is a bug that appeared recently with version 1.11.1.   Many of us here play an older version when new bugs annoy us. I think that all the places who sell KSP make earlier versions available,

The bug tracker has reports, but no good work-around  https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/27162 https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/27166 https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/27169
The workaround is- just don’t use the extra SAS modes until your pilots level up enough to use them. Prograde/retrograde is at level 1, radial/normal at level 3 and target/node at level 5 I think?

On 2/15/2021 at 5:02 AM, jimmymcgoochie said:

The workaround is- just don’t use the extra SAS modes until your pilots level up enough to use them. Prograde/retrograde is at level 1, radial/normal at level 3 and target/node at level 5 I think?

Prograde/retrograde is level 1, radial in/out and normal/anti-normal is level 2, and target/anti-target and maneuver is level 3.
